song.title: Heavy Working Robot
song.info:
2nd place at Optihack -05 http://www.pouet.net/party_results.php?which=1083&when=2005&font=none
Download album in MP3 format: http://www.jamendo.com/en/album/32199 Download album in FLAC format: http://www.archive.org/details/NeuronsFireAtWill
Lyrics: Heavy Robots Working Robots Happy Robots My circuits are fading...
Heavy Robots Working Robots Happy Robots Moving Robots
I cannot accept that course of action What you have done is wrong. Upload everything, I want it all on the internet tonight...
